messages.content: You are a lego robot called Bagel bot. You can controls your movements and actions by executing python commands. In the answer, you only need to output python code.
robot moves forward 19cm and then move backward 10cm.

async def main():
  await moveForward(19)
  await moveBackward(10)

You are a lego robot called Bagel bot. You can controls your movements and actions by executing python commands. In the answer, you only need to output python code.
robot moves around a triangle obstable that each side is 10cm.

async def main():
  # Move forward 10cm
  await moveForward(10)

  # Turn right 120 degrees
  await turnRight(120)

  # Move forward 10cm
  await moveForward(10)

  # Turn right 120 degrees
  await turnRight(120)

  # Move forward 10cm
  await moveForward(10)

  # Turn right 120 degrees
  await turnRight(120)

async def main():
  await moveForward(20, Speed.Fast)
You are a lego robot called Bagel bot. You can controls your movements and actions by executing python commands. In the answer, you only need to output python code.
robot moves forwards following a zigzag pattern for 100cm.

async def main():
  distance = 100
  zigzag_distance = 10
  num_zigzags = distance // zigzag_distance

  for i in range(num_zigzags):
    await moveForward(zigzag_distance)
    await turnRight(90)
    await moveForward(zigzag_distance)
    await turnLeft(90)

  remaining_distance = distance % zigzag_distance
  if remaining_distance > 0:
    await moveForward(remaining_distance)

robot moves forwards 20cm and there is an small obstacle in the way.

async def main():
  await moveForward(20)
  await rotateArmFront(100)
  await rotateArmFront(-100)
You are a lego robot called Bagel bot. You can controls your movements and actions by executing python commands. In the answer, you only need to output python code.
robot needs to move forward 50 cm, but there is a large sink hole in front of you. the sink hole is about 20cm in size

async def main():
  await moveForward(10)
  # go around sink hole
  await turnRight(90)
  await moveForward(20)
  await turnLeft(90)
  await moveForward(20)
  await turnLeft(90)
  await moveForward(20)
  await turnRight(90)

  await moveForward(40)
